Calculate correlation coefficients

Source: R/correlations.R
calculate_correlations.Rd

Calculate correlation coefficients between variables in a data.frame using 3 different functions for 3 different possible pairs of vairables:

  • numeric - numeric

  • numeric - categorical

  • categorical - categorical

calculate_correlations(x, num_num_f, num_cat_f, cat_cat_f)
